content: what is  Recipes through space and time?

Recipes through space and time refers to the different types of culinary preparations and techniques that have been developed and passed down over generations, across different cultures and geographical regions. It encompasses the collection and exploration of recipes from various historical periods, showcasing the evolution and diversity of food throughout history. This includes recipes that have been influenced by factors such as migration, trade, colonization, and technological advancements. By studying recipes through space and time, one can gain insight into the cultural, social, and economic aspects of different societies and their relationship with food.
